comments.author: Sariel V.7024
comments.body:
Since we’ve pretty well delved into aspects of player characters, I thought it might be worthwhile to do the same with enemies. Within reason, of course. Covered aspects could include:

Name
Level
Rank (non, Copper, Silver, gold, magenta)
Race (for sigil/potion interaction)
Affiliation (as above)
Armor values
Resistances/permanant boons
Attacks
Spawn Locations (map IDs)
Equipped skins
any other trivia that gets encoded that we don’t normally see.

Drop lists would be cool, but I’m not holding my breath
